ARABIC: فَفِرُّوٓا۟ إِلَى ٱللَّهِ إِنِّى لَكُم مِّنْهُ نَذِيرٌ مُّبِينٌ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: So flee to Allah. Truly I bring you a clear warning from Him.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: So turn to God. I give you a clear warning from Him.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: Flee, therefore, to Allah. Surely I am a clear warner to you from Him;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: (Muhammad), tell them,"Seek refuge in God. I have been sent from Him to plainly warn you.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: “Therefore rush towards Allah; indeed I am from Him, a clear Herald of Warning towards you.”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: So, flee to Allah. Verily, I am a plain warner to you from Him.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: Therefore fly to Allah, surely I am a plain warner to you from Him.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: Therefore flee unto God! I am a clear warner from Him to you.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: Therefor flee unto Allah; lo! I am a plain warner unto you from him.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: Therefore hasten to God; truly, I am sent by Him to give you clear warning.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: Flee therefore Unto Allah; verily I am Unto you from Him a warner manifest.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: ‘So flee toward Allah. Indeed, I am from Him a manifest warner to you.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: Hasten ye then (at once) to Allah: I am from Him a Warner to you, clear and open!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: So flee to Allah (from His Torment to His Mercy Islamic Monotheism), verily, I (Muhammad SAW) am a plain warner to you from Him.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: Therefore, flee to Allah. I am a clear warner to you from Him.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: “So flee towards God. I am to you from Him a clear warner.”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: So flee to Allah. Indeed, I am to you from Him a clear warner.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [51:50] So flee unto God, that is to say, away from His punishment toward His reward by being obedient to Him and not disobeying Him. Truly I am a clear warner to you from Him.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (Therefore flee unto Allah) flee from Allah unto Allah; it is also said that this means: flee from contravening against Allah to obeying Him; (lo! I am a plain warner unto you from Him) I am a warning messenger who explains matters to you in a language you understand.
